EmailTemplate.description: Someone ready for Atlas but not in an area we have TFs
EmailTemplate.name: TeamFacilitatorArea
EmailTemplate.subject: TeamFacilitatorAreas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out. It sounds like DOG NAME has been doing some excellent work and has made great progress, and could very well be ready to start Atlas' program. Unfortunately, we do not have any Team Facilitators at this time who would be able to work hands-on with you. We are expanding our team of Facilitators in new locations across the US and we will hopefully have some more in your area.
I can keep your information, and as soon as we have someone available near you, I will contact you if you are interested!
Let me know if you have any questions.
Best, {!User.FirstName}
